items.sentence: Tom won't permit you to continue doing that.

Tom will probably get fined if he does that.
Tom will probably figure out how to do that.

Tom will likely be very hesitant to do that.
Tom will likely be the first one to do that.
Tom will likely be interested in doing that.
Tom will definitely get a chance to do that.
Tom will be the only one allowed to do that.
I'm sure that you guys are going to miss me.
This is a problem for young people to solve.
This is the biggest cat that I've ever seen.
This is the very book I've been looking for.
This is the fifth concert by this orchestra.
This is the hotel where we stayed last year.

Tom will find you, no matter where you hide.
There are some hot dogs in the refrigerator.

Are you looking for criticism or validation?
The prophet's answer disappointed the woman.
My grandmother used to be a beautiful woman.
I'm glad to hear that you're feeling better.
I'd like my name to be put back on the list.
